mapper.select: SELECT rr.ROUTINE_REVIEW_NUMBER, rr.ROUTINE_NUMBER, rr.routine_review_title, m.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, rr.ROUTINE_REVIEW_CREATED_DATE , rr.ROUTINE_REVIEW_UPDATED_DATE, rr.ROUTINE_REVIEW_CONTENT FROM tbl_Routine_Review rr LEFT JOIN tbl_file_routine_review fr ON rr.ROUTINE_REVIEW_NUMBER = fr.ROUTINE_REVIEW_NUMBER JOIN tbl_Member m ON rr.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE rr.routine_review_number = #{routineReviewNumber}
